title: High elos need to stop backtalking bronzies.
body: High elos should learn to stop back talking bronze 1s or lower. If someone from diamond has an opinion that differs from a bronze, the diamond should NOT try to reason with the low elo. He shouldn't ask why either. He should take what the bronze says as fact without talking back. Too many times, I've seen a diamond backtalk a bronze 5, and it's disgusting, because the diamond is wrong most of the time. The only time a diamond is right is when 500,000 diamonds are talking back to a single bronze 5. There's a reason why you're stuck in dismond. It's because you think differently than the bronzies. Start thinking like a bronzie.
